title: Helpify
description: A modern service-sharing app with real-time updates.
details: Helpify is a modern service-sharing web application where users can find, offer, and book various types of services with ease. It's designed to provide a seamless and intuitive experience for service management, booking, and real-time status updates.

title: Work Window
description: A freelance task marketplace connecting clients with freelancers for micro-jobs and task-based bidding.
details: Work Window is a responsive freelance task marketplace allowing users to post tasks, bid on jobs, and manage tasks in a personalized dashboard. It features secure authentication (email/password & Google), dynamic task listing, bid tracking, and a sleek UI enhanced with React Simple Typewriter and React Awesome Reveal.

title: Portfolio Website
description: My personal portfolio built using modern web technologies and deployed on Vercel.
details: Showcasing my skills, projects, and contact form. Includes dark/light mode, smooth scroll, and responsive layout.
